table.name: quote_ship_unit
table.description: Ship unit details of the quote

columns.name: QUOTE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the quote.

columns.name: SEQUENCE
columns.description: Sequence number for the ship unit.

columns.name: COMMODITY_TYPE
columns.description: The type of commodity.

columns.name: ITEM_GID
columns.description: The GID for the item.

columns.name: NMFC_CLASS_GID
columns.description: The GID for the National Motor Freight Classification (NMFC). The NMFC is a critical piece of information used for rating Less-Than-Truckload shipments in North America. If you intend to rate shipments using RATEWAREXL or RATEWAREXL WITH CARRIERCONNECT it's important that the NMFC class information entered is a standard NMFC freight class - for example, 50, 55, 60, 65, 70, 77.5 etc.

columns.name: STCC_GID
columns.description: The GID for the Standard Transportation Commodity Code (STCC).

columns.name: SITC_GID
columns.description: The GID for the Standard International Trade Classification (SITC) is a classification of goods used to classify the exports and imports of a country to enable comparing different countries and years. The classification system is maintained by the United Nations. Not used by OTM - all cross border compliance related classifications are handled by GTM.

columns.name: HTS_GID
columns.description: The GID for the Harmonized Tariff Schedule (HTS). Not used by OTM - all cross border compliance related classifications are handled by GTM.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED_COMMODITY_GID
columns.description: The GID for the user defined commodity code.

columns.name: UDC_CLASSIFICATION_LIST_GID
columns.description: The GID for the user defined commodity code list.

columns.name: WEIGHT
columns.description: Weight.

columns.name: WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for weight.

columns.name: WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: Weight amount in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: VOLUME
columns.description: Volume.

columns.name: VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for volume.

columns.name: VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: Volume amount in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: IS_SPLITABLE
columns.description: Flag to indicate if the quantity for this item is splittable.

columns.name: TRANSPORT_HANDLING_UNIT_GID
columns.description: The GID for the transport handling unit.

columns.name: SHIP_UNIT_COUNT
columns.description: Count of transport handling units.

columns.name: LENGTH
columns.description: Length.

columns.name: LENGTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for length.

columns.name: LENGTH_BASE
columns.description: Length in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: WIDTH
columns.description: Width.

columns.name: WIDTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for width.

columns.name: WIDTH_BASE
columns.description: Width in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: HEIGHT
columns.description: Height.

columns.name: HEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for height.

columns.name: HEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: Height in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: DECLARED_VALUE
columns.description: Declared value.

columns.name: DECLARED_VALUE_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The GID for the declared value currency.

columns.name: DECLARED_VALUE_BASE
columns.description: The declared value in the base currency.

columns.name: IATA_SCR_CODE_GID
columns.description: n/a

columns.name: COMMODITY_GID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the commodity.

columns.name: EXPORT_HTS_GID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the export Harmonized Tariff System (HTS).

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: PACKAGED_ITEM_GID
columns.description: Identifies the package item corresponding to the item
